about_the_game:
Travel to the 18th century on tropical islands with the main character. Fight pirates, enter into a confrontation with a secret clan that is conquering the world by mastering time travel technologies. Search for treasures and artifacts of forgotten civilizations. Meet your destiny and learn what friendship, love and courage are.

Impenetrable jungles, beaches and the Beauty of uninhabited islands, a town on an island near Panama from the 18th century, a tavern, a dungeon, dungeons, towers, sea battles, an underwater world and much more - in this game you will really experience the taste of adventure and travel.

Liber 2 is an action adventure game where you will climb the rocks of a mysterious island, fight pirates with swords, shoot a pirate pistol, explore the underwater world, search for secrets and secrets, participate in epic sea battles.
Choose any level of difficulty, draw your saber and board!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5| Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1060/ Radeon RX 57
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7| Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060

short_description: Alex woke up on a desert island and he has to find out where and in what century the book of ancient civilization brought him this time. Desperately not broken, the main character is looking for a way to return home, but acquires much more and finds his destiny.
